duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and implement activities supporting accurate and timely document management, adherence to tight project timelines, and protection of PHI.
Support the team by requesting, retrieving, processing, tracking, and organizing incoming Medical Records which will be reviewed by the clinical and/or coding teams.
Manage and maintain Medical records repository.
Ensure accurate and timely record uploads, compliance with processes to protect PHI, and effective tracking of records and record requests.
Assist internal team and provider groups to troubleshoot any logistical or technical issues regarding records requests, retrieval, or storage.
Effectively communicate with team members and external providers to ensure adherence to challenging project timelines.
Identify process issues and contribute to the design of solutions.
Complete additional tasks as required to support the project.

education_certification.credential: Recent Health Care or Health Plan experience (minimum of 2 years)
Experience with reading and reviewing Medical Records and verifying documentation matches CPT code from claim
